content.en: Algorithmic fault diagnosis: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms, specifically the random forests algorithm, to improve fault diagnosis in various systems such as wind turbines, rolling bearings, building energy systems, and more. These algorithms are being proposed as effective methods for fault detection and classification, offering a data-driven approach to identify and diagnose faults. By integrating algorithms like random forests with other techniques, researchers aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of fault diagnosis in different applications.
content.da: Algoritmisk fejldiagnose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer, specifikt random forests-algoritmen, for at forbedre fejldiagnosen i forskellige systemer såsom vindmøller, rullelejer, bygningsenergisystemer og mere. Disse algoritmer foreslås som effektive metoder til fejldetektion og klassifikation og tilbyder en datadrevet tilgang til at identificere og diagnosticere fejl. Ved at integrere algoritmer som random forests med andre teknikker, sigter forskerne mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af fejldiagnosen i forskellige anvendelser.
